thread.section_title: Kampala Serena Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing place to visit and dine
thread.title_full: Amazing place to visit and dine - Review of Kampala Serena Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Ronald M
title: Amazing place to visit and dine
text:
My 1st time to visit Serena was just as expected and my experience was just to the fullest, we had some coffee in one of the outlets with my partners that we had a small meeting from along trip of Abu Dhabi direct to Serena,
some black points I would like to mention was we were welcomed nicely and the waiter who attended to us was some how in a rush, so he took our orders and later, but it really took along time to have it delivered and in anyway no one took a step ahead to come and see if every thing was okay, we our selves had to come and look for waitress and again ask her for how long our would take and she completely had no idea at all, well she looked new and she told us that she will follow up and come back to us, it again had to take more like 10minustes. well I would suggest at least a glass of water on the table as you wait for your order that is being prepared than seating and just talking to each other like your not in a five star hotel, otherwise every thing was okay. the meal was supper nice and the hotel its self is super amazing from the start. will definitely visit again when I come back and this time again I will stay there to have that experience from the inside
